main event: On October 2, 1961, multiple witnesses reported seeing a bright, metallic, disc-shaped object hovering over Salt Lake City, Utah, which exhibited rapid movements and then disappeared from sight.
interesting points: The object was reported at an altitude between 6,000 and 15,000 feet,Witnesses described the object as emitting no sound and having no visible means of propulsion,The object was observed for durations ranging from 5 to 15 minutes by multiple witnesses,Ground observers and pilots corroborated the sighting, an investigation was unable to identify the object and labeled it as unknown.
location: Salt Lake City, Utah, United States
